translations: abbr.航班信息显示系统（Flight Information Display System）

phrs.translation: 显示系统(Flight Information Display System), 航班信息显示系统(Flight Informatin Display System), 航显系统

sentences.sentence: Non-methane hydrocarbons in the gas sample are analyzed simultaneously by GC with double columns and double FIDs.
sentences.translation: 介绍了用双柱双氢火焰离子化检测器同时进样气相色谱法分析气体样品中非甲烷烃。
